message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $110 is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $105 for it. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $108. What do you think?
